Room.Name: Ruby Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the ruby hallway to the mage's training rooms.
Room.LongDescription: Enlightenment shall be yours. This hallway is the path to mystical and powerful knowledge. As your brethern above you know, going west shall eventually bring you to the east hallway. However, unless misfortune befalls you, once you travel east you shall never travel west again.
